title: Convert string to snakecase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to snakecase

Snakecase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with underscores.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello_world"

404: Not Found

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to snakecase

Snakecase is a style of writing in which all letters are lowercase and spaces are replaced with underscores.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "hello_world"
```
